Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.

Have you perchance encountered my errand boy? Grey, rotund fellow with a vacant gaze? No? I dispatched him with orders to procure additional happi materials some time ago, but have seen neither fin nor barbel of him since.

You surely recognize that I cannot waste my talents tracking wayward lackeys─the festival would collapse into uncivilized chaos were I to neglect my intellectual endeavors for but a moment. If you are not otherwise engaged, can you search for him in my stead?
His sojourn should have brought him to Mol Iloh, so you are likely to find him in the vicinity. If you discover him to have encountered complications, I trust you will ameliorate the situation.
Woe, woe is me! I have encountered complications. If only someone would ameliorate them...
Oh! What a surprise to see you here, standing in silence mere ilms away. Yes, yes. Please never do it again.

I was absorbed in thought, you see. I had promised to trade with the Mol for materials we can use in our festive happi, and brought some fincrafted fineries along for this purpose. But then, when I least expected it...

...I was trampled by a charging dzo! It had dashed several malms by the time I regained my normal shape and the ability to walk. Yes, yes. I eventually discovered it devouring the last of my fineries.

...A flock of yol swooped down upon me! Luckily, I was able to liberate myself from their talons. Yes, yes. Less luckily, we were at least a malm in the air by then. By the time I regained solid ground and consciousness, my fineries were gone.
...I noticed several Buduga in pursuit! Hoping they would take my fineries instead of my life, I threw them behind me and ran. Yes, yes. Tossed them one and all.
I have no choice but to remake what I have lost. But I am only one Namazu, and require many fineries for trade. Will you lend me a fin?
Specifically, I find myself in need of more nails. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the materials, so take whatever you need from this box.
Specifically, I find myself in need of more thick fabric. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the materials, so take whatever you need from this box.
Specifically, I find myself in need of more lubricating oil. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the ingredients, so take whatever you need from this box.
Specifically, I find myself in need of more steppe mica. Yes, yes. Can you bring me three fairly large chunks? I have had success finding deposits east of Mol Iloh.
Specifically, I find myself in need of more steppe safflower. Yes, yes. Can you harvest some? I have had success looking in the lush patches southeast of Mol Iloh.
Specifically, I find myself in need of another khaal crab. Yes, yes. Can you bring me one? I have had success fishing for them with a bit of salmon roe in Hak Khaal.
Please return to me when you are ready. I will craft the finest of fineries, yes, yes.
Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.
Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.
Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.
The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.
Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.
Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.
Did everything go to plan? Are all of your assorted fingers intact?
Thank you, thank you! I will fashion these into fineries and deliver them to the Mol forthwith.
Can I trouble you to relay my tribulations to Seigetsu the Enlightened? He doubtless wonders about the delay.
Stay safe. And do not get killed!
I take it you return with information?
Hm. Precisely as I imagined.
He is a hardworking fellow, but a veritable beacon for misfortune. I daresay his poor luck alone could bring about the Namazu's annihilation.
As for you, I have no doubt that your efforts this day will have a profound effect on the outcome of our festival, and contribute to the enlightenment of Namazu one and all. Probably.
